answers.answer: Congrats on your baby! Im only 13 weeks still have a long time to go. Baby 2
I have 7 days to go and I'm excited
Congrats!! A little chunk!! I've got 16 days to go. Starting to get a bit nervous!
I have a little less then 3 weeks left to go, baby #1 !
I have 11 days and this is my first  excited and nervous.
I have 102 says to go. This is my second kid. My frost baby was 9.0 even
I've got 24 days... I'm 36 weeks, and extremely anxious...
Out of curiosity, why are they taking your baby so early?  I mean I know 36 weeks isn't a horrible time to take the baby but still is early.  Is it because of his size?

question: I am so excited and can't wait. They keep telling me this baby is really large, even though I only 35 weeks and 4 days. They are predicting an 8+ pound baby at c-section time and I will be only 36 weeks 4 days. I have had all small babies so not sure what to think about big baby. How long do you all have to go?
title: 7 more days tell c-section
